Megatron Revived/ Organics:
 
"Then I will start by burying this 'Hydras'.  He still has those corrupted tendancies, which makes him public enemy number one right now." the clone said with a distasteful sneer.
 
Organics gave Windlord's arm a squeeze as she looked him in the eye.
"Thanks, it helps him." she whispered.  "It really means alot, to both of us." she added with a wink.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

While Windlord whaited and answer of Rodimus he replied"However, you 
have chance to do things better..."
